content.raw:
I've been trying to build bottles for that pull request, and the el_capitan machine is complaining about `-std=c++17`:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-elcapitan/238/console

maybe that clang in that distro is too old for c++17. It was successful on the newest high_sierra distro:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-highsierra&build=176)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-highsierra/176/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-highsierra/176/
content.html:
I've been trying to build bottles for that pull request, and the el_capitan machine is complaining about -std=c++17:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-elcapitan/238/console

maybe that clang in that distro is too old for c++17. It was successful on the newest high_sierra distro:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-highsierra/176/
